sentence: The image is an advertisement featuring bold, colorful text.
sentence_cn: 该图片是一则广告，其中的文字粗体且色彩鲜艳。

sentence: At the top, it says "ENTIRE SITE" in uppercase letters, with orange text and a black shadow.
sentence_cn: 顶部用大写字母写着“整个网站”，带有橙色文字和黑色阴影。

sentence: Below this, "30%" is written in large magenta numerals, also with a black shadow.
sentence_cn: 在其下方，用大号洋红色数字写着“30%”，同样带有黑色阴影。

sentence: A line is drawn beneath the "30%", and underneath the line is the word "TO" in smaller black letters.
sentence_cn: “30%”下方画了一条线，线下方是用较小的黑色字母写的“TO”一词。

sentence: Below "TO" is "75%" in large magenta numerals, similarly shadowed in black.
sentence_cn: “TO”下方是用大号洋红色数字表示的“75%”，同样用黑色阴影表示。

sentence: At the bottom, "OFF" is displayed in large orange letters with a black shadow.
sentence_cn: 底部以大橙色字母显示“OFF”，并带有黑色阴影。

sentence: In smaller text at the very bottom, it states, "EXCLUDES NEW ARRIVALS, SLEEPWEAR, FOOTWEAR AND ACCESSORIES," indicating the exclusions to the sale.
sentence_cn: 最底部较小的文字写着“不包括新品、睡衣、鞋类和配饰”，表明不包含在销售范围内。
words: EXCLUDES NEW ARRIVALS, SLEEPWEAR, FOOTWEAR AND ACCESSORIES,
